name: SetPrimaryLanguageBlogPost
description:
Set the primary language of a blog post in a multi-language group.

This tool updates the primary language of a multi-language group to match the language of the specified blog post by its ID. It is useful when managing multilingual content on HubSpot CMS blogs.

parameters.name: blog_post_id
parameters.description: The ID of the blog post to set as primary in its multi-language group.

value_schema.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.
